name: Hieroglyphic Assault
description:
Thoth conjures three Hieroglyphs around him, ignoring the Basic Attack Movement penalty. His next 3 Basic Attacks pass through Enemies and apply Ability Damage instead. If these attacks pass through the Glyph of Pain, their range is increased by 30.
Hitting an enemy with this ability increases the damage they take from each 
subsequent shot by 20%. Every time an enemy god is hit by this ability, the ability’s cooldown is reduced (upon finishing) by 1s.
stats: Damage Per Shot: 40/60/80/100/120 (+20% of your magical power)
